params.isValid: True to be valid, false otherwise.

params._baseQuorum: Default quorum for all functions with no set quorum.
params._minProposalPower: Minimum voting power needed to submit a proposal.

deauthorize(address).details: Privileged function to de authorize an address

params.who: The address to remove authorization from

params.targets: list of target addresses the timelock contract will interact with.

isAuthorized(address).details: Returns true if an address is authorized

returns._0: true if authorized false if not

proposal(address[],bytes[],address[],byt.details: all provided votingVaults must be approved vaults `approvedVaults`.

params.extraVaultData: an encoded list of extra data to provide to vaults
params.lastCall: timestamp after which this cannot be executed, note should be                 more than the voting time period
params.targets: list of target addresses the timelock contract will interact with.
params.votingVaults: voting vaults to draw voting power from.

params.target: the contract for which the quorum is set

returns._0: The quorum needed to pass the function at this point in time

params._minProposalPower: Minimum voting power needed to submit a proposal.

vote(address[],bytes[],uint256,uint8).details: all provided votingVaults must be approved vaults `approvedVaults`. Addresses can re-vote, but the previous vote's effect will be negated.

params.extraVaultData: extra bytes data to give to each vault
params.votingVaults: voting vaults to draw voting power from.

params.vault: the address to check if it is an approved vault

approvedVaults.return: true if approved false if not approved

returns._0: true if approved false if not approved

approvedVaults(address).notice: A method auto generated from a public storage mapping, looks         up which vault addresses are approved by core voting

changeVaultStatus(address,bool).notice: Updates the status of a voting vault.

getProposalVotingPower(uint256).notice: gets the current voting power for a proposal

quorums(address,bytes4).notice: Override of the getter for the 'quorums' mapping which returns the default         quorum when the quorum is not set.

setCustomQuorum(address,bytes4,uint256).notice: Sets a quorum for a specific address and selector.

setLockDuration(uint256).notice: Updates the lock duration of a proposal.

setMinProposalPower(uint256).notice: Updates the minimum voting power needed to submit a proposal.
